data.title: Hang Tight Bluetooth Speaker (HX-P303)
data.meta_description: Hang Around for as long as you want today. This compact speaker has up to 20 hours of playtime with its 30-meter/100-foot Bluetoothâ¢ range. Pair it with another Hang Around for a fuller stereo sound.
data.text:
tonycdh

Illinois

Age 35 to 44

â â â â â â â â â â

Connects but is very itermittent

When I connect it to my laptop, it shows up as a Headset or Headphones. If I select headset, there is no bass, its very flat and only one channel plays, also it turns itself off after about 10 minutes. It is plugged in directly to the wall outlet the whole time. If I select headphones, it connects and the bass and both channels is on, however, it stutters, like its a bad connection. The Hang Around sets right next to my computer, so there is no interference, etc. Ive disconnected, reconnected multiple times to no avail.

Product Owned For: 3 months

Product Used: Weekly

Recommends this product:â Yes
